title: Awesome List Updates on Aug 03, 2024
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Aug 03, 2024 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Godot
items.content_text:
### Plugins and scripts / Godot 4

*   [PixelPen (⭐143)](https://github.com/pixelpen-dev/pixelpen) - Pixel art drawing and animation: Common drawing tools such as selection, shape creation, mirroring, tiling, and animation features within the Godot editor.
items.content_html:
Plugins and scripts / Godot 4

  • PixelPen (⭐143) - Pixel art drawing and animation: Common drawing tools such as selection, shape creation, mirroring, tiling, and animation features within the Godot editor.

items.title: Awesome Angular
items.content_text:
### Authentication / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ng-supabase (⭐36)](https://github.com/rustygreen/ng-supabase) - An Angular component library for your [Supabase](https://supabase.com/) project!

### Calendars / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [angular-calendar-timeline (⭐16)](https://github.com/oOps1627/angular-calendar-timeline) - A timeline for Angular 13+ that shows tasks or events on a timeline in different modes: days, weeks, and months. This library is pretty small and DOESN'T use big dependencies like JQuery or Moment.js. Library also supports SSR.

### Editor Components / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [tinymce-angular (⭐342)](https://github.com/tinymce/tinymce-angular) - Official [TinyMCE](https://www.tiny.cloud/) Angular Component.

### Form Controls / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-autosize-input (⭐22)](https://github.com/joshuawwright/ngx-autosize-input) - An Angular directive that automatically adjusts the width of an input element. It shrinks and increases the width.
items.content_html:
Authentication / Google Developer Experts

  • ng-supabase (⭐36) - An Angular component library for your Supabase project!

Calendars / Google Developer Experts

  • angular-calendar-timeline (⭐16) - A timeline for Angular 13+ that shows tasks or events on a timeline in different modes: days, weeks, and months. This library is pretty small and DOESN'T use big dependencies like JQuery or Moment.js. Library also supports SSR.

Editor Components / Google Developer Experts

  • tinymce-angular (⭐342) - Official TinyMCE Angular Component.

Form Controls / Google Developer Experts

  • ngx-autosize-input (⭐22) - An Angular directive that automatically adjusts the width of an input element. It shrinks and increases the width.

items.title: Awesome Rust
items.content_text:

*   [perpetual-ml/perpetual (⭐513)](https://github.com/perpetual-ml/perpetual) \[[perpetual](https://crates.io/crates/perpetual)] - A self-generalizing gradient boosting machine which doesn't need hyperparameter optimization.
items.content_html:
Libraries / Artificial Intelligence

  • perpetual-ml/perpetual (⭐513) [perpetual] - A self-generalizing gradient boosting machine which doesn't need hyperparameter optimization.

items.title: Awesome Go
items.content_text:
### Networking

*   [net](https://golang.org/x/net) - This repository holds supplementary Go networking libraries.

### Serialization

*   [go-csvlib (⭐18)](https://github.com/tiendc/go-csvlib) - High level and rich functionalities CSV serialization/deserialization library.
items.content_html:
Networking

  • net - This repository holds supplementary Go networking libraries.

Serialization

  • go-csvlib (⭐18) - High level and rich functionalities CSV serialization/deserialization library.

items.title: Awesome Ai Tools
items.content_text:
### Text / Productivity

*   [Chat With PDF by Copilot.us](https://copilot.us/apps/chat-with-pdf) - An AI app that enables dialogue with PDF documents, supporting interactions with multiple files simultaneously through language models.
*   [Recall](https://www.getrecall.ai/) - Summarize Anything, Forget Nothing
*   [Talently AI](https://interview.talently.ai/?utm_source=mahseema-awesome-ai-tool\&utm_medium=c_and_p\&utm_campaign=tool-listing) - An Al interviewer that conducts live, conversational interviews and gives real-time evaluations to effortlessly identify top performers and scale your recruitment process.

### Related Awesome Lists / Deep Learning

*   [Altern](https://altern.ai) - Find Best AI Tools
*   [Awesome AI Models (⭐76)](https://github.com/dariubs/awesome-ai-models) - A curated list of top AI models and LLMs
items.content_html:
Text / Productivity

  • Chat With PDF by Copilot.us - An AI app that enables dialogue with PDF documents, supporting interactions with multiple files simultaneously through language models.
  • Recall - Summarize Anything, Forget Nothing
  • Talently AI - An Al interviewer that conducts live, conversational interviews and gives real-time evaluations to effortlessly identify top performers and scale your recruitment process.

Related Awesome Lists / Deep Learning

  • Altern - Find Best AI Tools
  • Awesome AI Models (⭐76) - A curated list of top AI models and LLMs
